title: Online English Literature Education Design Based on ADDIE Model and UDL Principles

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English reading comprehension skills and experience in literary text analysis
context.additional_context: Microlearning-based education for in-service professionals, enabling flexible participation in mobile environments. Formative assessment-centered operation in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) setting

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the main themes and techniques of various literary genres (poetry, novels, plays) with over 85% accuracy
Learners can engage with online English literature content using three or more personalized learning strategies based on UDL principles
Learners can apply microlearning modules reflecting each phase of the ADDIE model (Analysis-Design-Development-Implementation-Evaluation) to real-world cases
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
